heroTe: Green oasis in the heart of Prague. It is modern, it is peaceful, and it has astonishing views of the city. Altogether it makes it a perfect place to relax or organize events of any kind.
sfTe: An ideal location for the informal gatherings. A very welcome and enjoyable place which fits perfectly into the daily work schedule with constantly changing atmosphere according to the weather and the seasons. Accompanied by the unique 360° view that that will certainly exceed all the expectations.
sfp1Te: The perfect escape from the everyday life in the office filled with business and paperwork. After a busy day topped up with meetings, it is important to slow down and disconnect for a second only a few steps away from your workplace. The green rooftop is the place for you to forget that you are in the middle of the capital city. Perfect rest leads to perfect performance and the most creative ideas.
underImage: Individual green patios accessible only one step away from your office.
sfp2Te: The key advantage of this building is the location. Located literally in the heart of Prague at one of the most historically significant addresses of the Czech Republic. All the important sights of this extraordinary city can be spotted on the terrace with the exquisite 360° view including the world known Prague castle.
